message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but $13,500 would be my final offer.  If this doesn't work for you, I'm going to have to look at other options.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $13,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
